name: BioMover
description:
Based on the blind watchmaker algorithm - evolve your biomorph and reach the goal!

  • Evolve your Biomorph by selecting your favourite.
  • Four offsprings will be created.
  • The longer an individual the more it moves upwards, the wider, the more the individual moves left.
  • Wake it up and see if it reaches the goal

I developed this game during Ludumdare Gamejam 45 in October 2019. Sorry I did not have time for nicer graphics, more levels or mechanics. Later maybe ;-)

If you are interested in details on the recursive algorithm that creates the biomorphs, google for the Blind Watchmaker Algorithm.
